name: Lando Calrissian, Unlikely Hero
Lore: 'Gambler. Scoundrel. Ever since Lando''s ''little'' maneuver at the Battle of Taanab, his piloting skills had become legendary.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to anything he pilots. May reveal from hand to take Lady Luck into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle; and deploy both simultaneously. While piloting (or with a female), adds one battle destiny. During battle, may target a card here. Draw destiny. If destiny < twice the number of scoundrels here, target is forfeit = 0.',
